name: tastemaker
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person, company, etc. that has an influence on what will become fashionable, or considered to be of good quality: What is a tastemaker? Someone who knows - years before the rest of us - which designers and designs will become hot property.
More examplesFewer examplesPeel was a tastemaker who introduced at least four generations of listeners to sounds outside the mainstream.How did we manage before Conran, tastemaker to the nation?They have found success by linking with a powerhouse like Starbucks, considered a tastemaker with consumers in areas other than coffee.A content creation organization such as the Times is a tastemaker. It's not only creating content, but it's also telling us what content we should be paying attention to.
